title: [bug] AppHandle::emit sometimes does not notify all windows

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

Using yesterday's alpha build (2.0.0-alpha.17)

```rust
// app: AppHandle
app.emit(EVENT_NAME, payload_object).ok();
```

Does not trigger an event in a window with an active listener

### Reproduction

Use an apphandle to emit a global event:
```rust
// app: AppHandle
app.emit(EVENT_NAME, payload_object).ok();
```

Listen to the event from JS:
```javascript
appWindow.listen("EVENT_NAME", (event) => { ... });
```

### Expected behavior

_No response_
